```{r enzplotCaption}

InhibPresent <- any(sim_enz_dataframe$Inhibitor != "none")

CapText1 <-
    switch(as.character(
        InhibPresent), 
        "FALSE" = unique(sim_enz_dataframe$Substrate),
        
        "TRUE" = paste0(
            prettify_compound_name(unique(sim_enz_dataframe$Substrate)), 
            "in the absence of ",
            prettify_compound_name(unique(sim_enz_dataframe$Inhibitor[!sim_enz_dataframe$Inhibitor == "none"])),
            " (solid line) and on the **th day of ** days of dosing of ", 
            prettify_compound_name(unique(sim_enz_dataframe$Inhibitor[!sim_enz_dataframe$Inhibitor == "none"])),
            " (dashed line). The lines represent the arithmetic/geometric mean data for the simulated population (n = **)"))


```

*Depicted are simulated `r ifelse(Tissue) == "liver", "hepatic", "gut")` `r unique(sim_enz_dataframe$Enzyme)` levels following A SINGLE/MULTIPLE ORAL DOSE(s) of `r CapText1`. Source simulated data: `r unique(sim_enz_dataframe$File)`.*
